entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
